The `select` method is part of the `DirectScrolledList` class, which manages a scrollable list interface. This method handles the action taken when an item in the list is selected, triggering any associated commands and informing the parent component about the selection.


def select(self):
        assert self.notify.debugStateCall(self)
        self.nextCommand(*self.nextCommandExtraArgs)
        self._parent.selectListItem(self)
